name: Shoti
description: '''Jared Lim Almendras''' (born c. 2006 or 2007), known professionally as '''Shoti''', is a Filipino singer-songwriter. He signed a record deal in 2023 under [[Sony Music Philippines]]. He is best known for his 2022 single "LDR", which became a viral hit on social media and music charts in Southeast Asia. He records his songs in a mix of English and [[Cebuano language|Cebuano]].
